price: Ampa sε Yakyerεkyerε mfatoho biara mu akyerε nnipa wͻ saa Qur’aan yi mu, nanso nnipa pii mpε (nokorε no), na mmom (deε wͻpε ara nesε) wͻ’beyi (Nyankopͻn) boniayε.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
